name: Engravable Sterling Silver Bangle Bracelet with Textured Ridge
description:
New design for sterling silver bangle bracelet to be engraved and inscribed with your own inspirational quotes or sentimental words.   

This is similar to my very popular bangle offered here - http://tkmetalarts.bigcartel.com/product/custom-engraved-sterling-silver-bangle-bracelet.  However, the engraving will be on the inside face.  This bracelet will have a brushed matte finish.  

Please contact me and confirm the length or amount of engraving so I can tell you if it fits.  Each personalized bangle is made to order to allow full customizations; please allow up to 2 weeks for me to fabricate - that is, 2 weeks after confirmation of the quote to be engraved. If you need this order sooner, I might be able to accommodate. Just let me know.

Inscriptions are typically about 1mm tall, and in cursive. Custom work like this will require full payment first. This bracelet will be shipped with signature confirmation to ensure delivery.

Free-hand engraving is not the same as stamping, etching or machine engraving. Each piece shows unique work, very much like hand drawings or hand-writing. To read more about micro engraving, visit my blog - http://tkmetalarts.blogspot.com/2008/11/micro-engraving.html

name: Custom Hand Engraved Sterling Silver Bangle Bracelet
description:
Custom Hand Engraved Sterling Silver Bangle Bracelet, Inscribed with a quote or poem of YOUR choosing

Inscribed bangle bracelet that is made from heavy, solid sterling wire, and will be custom make just for you, with your own preferred saying. Hand engraving looks very much like a personal note you write as reminders, blessings and/or messages. Pictured is a sample bracelet with a Shakespeare quote from Hamlet:

“Doubt thou the stars are fire;
Doubt that the sun doth move;
Doubt truth to be a liar;
But never doubt I love.”

Material quality stamped, my hand signature appears on the inside face. Note that size selections are given as inside diameter. Extra time was spent in truing up all the surfaces so it can have clean crisp lines. Corners are rounded off slightly for comfort. High polished to a brilliant gleam. Actually, the high reflectivity made it quite a challenge to photograph.

Each personalized bangle is made to order to allow full customizations; please allow up to 2 weeks for me to fabricate - that is, 2 weeks after confirmation of the quote to be engraved. If you need this order sooner, I might be able to accommodate. Just send me a message.

Please contact me to work out the inscription details. Inscriptions are typically 1mm tall, and in cursive. Custom work like this will require full payment first. This bracelet will be shipped with signature confirmation to ensure delivery.

Free-hand engraving is not the same as stamping, etching or machine engraving. Each piece shows unique work, very much like hand drawings or hand-writing. To read more about micro engraving, visit my blog - http://tkmetalarts.blogspot.com/2008/11/micro-engraving.html 

See my other engraveable bracelet here - http://tkmetalarts.bigcartel.com/product/engraved-sterling-silver-bangle-bracelet-with-texture-line

name: Red Creek Jasper & Citrine Earrings
description:
These sterling silver set earrings feature inverted teardrop shaped and bookmatched red creek jasper. This set of jasper has vanilla and caramel colors. I added round faceted citrine to the bottom of these dangle earrings. Secure sterling silver lever back ear wires let these them hang freely. Simple settings that is pleasing and classic.

The earrings are around 2 inches long, including the ear wires.

name: Turquoise Blue Amazonite Wide Band Sterling Silver Ring
description:
Round amazonite stone is surrounded by my handmade silver work. The gray and turquoise color combination compliments all skin tone. The set stone rests on top of a comfortable square band, and I textured the top and bottom edges for interest.

This square wide band (10mm, just under half an inch) is made with heavy gauge sterling silver and is luxurious to the touch. Brushed matte finish that is lightly oxidized. Very study and will hold up to your daily wear.

Please contact me if you need a size different than listed.

name: Round Sterling Silver Pendant with Squares and Labradorite
description:
Round Sterling Silver Pendant with Squares and Labradorite

Blue labradorite at the center is very eye-catching as you move. At the right angles, the flashes out these bright blue light. Pairs of square holes spread evenly around the stone and add contemporary touches to the pendant. Simple geometric fun. I put a texture on the sterling silver setting.

The pendant is a 1-1/4 inch (31 mm) in diameter. To not distract from the pure geometry, I used a tube bail (that I made from flat sheet) on the back. In keeping with the clean lines, I use a steel cable neckwire with a magnetic clasp. Comes in your choice of 16 inch (40 cm) or 18 inch (45 cm) long neckwire. Please specify.

name: Cocktail Statement Ring with Black & White Jasper in Sterling Silver
description:
Cocktail Statement Ring with Black & White Jasper in Sterling Silver

Black jasper with light color inclusions that look like snowflakes in a night scene. The stone is 20x20mm diameter and is set in a heavy gauge recycled sterling silver. I gave the silver an overall shimmery linen-like texture.

I have 3 more of these Snowflake Jaspers that you can choose for your custom fit ring.  Contact me and I can email you a photo for your selection.

name: Montana Picture Agate in Sterling Silver Raised Setting
description:
Necklace Pendant of montana agate set in eco friendly sterling silver, picture perfect like a new moon rising from the cliffs.

Picturesque montana agate set in an elevated sterling silver setting to maximize light penetration through the translucent stone. You can see the picture from both sides of the pendant.

The agate cabochon is about 1-1/8 inch (38mm) in diameter, and comes on a longer 21-1/4 inch (54.5cm) oval cable sterling chain. A handmade hook clasp completes the piece. I gave the sterling a medium patina, resulting in a pearly grey shine.

A one of a kind stone and a very special piece. Don't miss out!

name: Handcrafted Orange Red Carnelian Cocktail Statement Ring
description:
Handcrafted Orange Red Carnelian Cocktail Statement Ring

Clean and modern, this is a substantial ring with no skimping on the silver setting. Oval shaped faceted orange red carnelian cabochon is very eye-catching. The recycled sterling silver has a shimmery texture that glows even in sunlight.

The ring top measures about 1 inch x 7/8 inch (25 x 20 mm). Pictured ring is sold but that means yours will be a totally custom piece.

Please contact me if you need a size different than listed.

name: Raspberry Pink Rhodochrosite Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace
description:
Raspberry Pink Rhodochrosite Sterling Silver Pendant Necklace

Gorgeous raspberry rose pink rhodochrosite is set against a dark charcoal gray silver setting. An absolutely elegant shade with lots of white banding. You can admire the stone from the back as well, which I left open. Rhodochrosite is not as abundant as it once was. This quality stone will be hard to find again.

The pendant is 1-3/4 x 1 inch (45 x 24 mm) and slides on a pretty 18 inch (45.7 cm) long sterling chain that compliments the marquise shape of the stone.

name: Handmade Sterling Silver Ring with Green Turquoise
description:
Handmade Sterling Silver Ring with Oval Green Turquoise, Size 6.5

Glass-like finished green turquoise that has dark and medium brown matrix. It is set in a heavy gauge recycled sterling silver. I gave the silver an overall shimmery linen-like texture for a modern look.

If this ring is your size, it will be shipped withing 2 business days. Otherwise, I have a few more similar green turquoise cabs to make a custom ring if you need another size. Please check my Shop Announcement for custom work schedule.
